long_description:
# Stone-like Blocks for Mineclonia (stonelike_blocks) ## Description Adds polished bricks for andesite, diorite and granite. These blocks can be crafted from it's ```polished``` counterparts. They have variants of stairs, slabs and walls. ### Crafting [ \[**Polished**\] \[**Polished**\] ]
[ \[**Polished**\] \[**Polished**\] ] → [**Polished bricks 4**] [ **Smooth Slab** ]
[ **Smooth Slab** ] &rarr [ **Smooth Chiseled** ]
name: stonelike_blocks
short_description: Adds polished bricks for andesite, diorite and granite.
title: Stone-like Blocks for Mineclonia
